summary:
Mystique - Standalone Follower
Adds Mysitque from the X-men movies to your game!
You can choose between naked or clothed version.
UNP, CBBE and UNPB
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#0000ff][size=6]Mystique[/size][/color]

[color=#00ffff](Standalone Follower based on [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/35535930/?]Yourskyrim123's[/url] RaceMenu Preset)[/color][/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/ec84a2xon/mystiquecloseup.jpg[/img]

[font=Verdana]Name:  Mystique
Race:  Nord Based 
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriageable:  Yes
Weight:  100
Body:  Basic UNP, UNPB, & CBBE
Skin:  Born Dragon
Weapon:  Unarmed
Class:  Combat Mage Elemental
Location:  Morthal (Moorside Inn)

Armor Version Now Available Under Optional Downloads
(CBBE & UNPB TBBP)

Levels with player.

Tested with EFF & AFT

Bonuses to Sneak, Block, and all Magic[/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/hx3ztb287/mystiquebackground2.jpg[/img]

[youtube]XvZm41wonx8[/youtube]
[youtube]GzU3Sz8vZr0[/youtube]
[youtube]_JBW-hY2yfQ[/youtube][youtube]S7ynJHsA48o[/youtube]

[font=Verdana][color=#0000ff][size=4]TO PLAY AS MYSTIQUE:[/size][/color]

Please use Yourskyrim123's preset located [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77333/?]here[/url]

[/font][font=Verdana][color=#0000ff][size=4]REQUIREMENTS:[/size][/color]

TBBP Compatible Skeleton such as XPMSE for Armor Versions

[color=#0000ff][size=4]RECOMMENDED:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics[/url]

[color=#0000ff][size=4]INSTALLATION:[/size][/color]

Manual or your favorite mod manager

[color=#0000ff][size=4]UNINSTALL:
[/size][/color]
Manual removal of all Mystique files or your favorite mod manager

[color=#0000ff][size=4]KNOWN ISSUES:
[/size][/color]
On UNP version there is blue line (see screenshots) in ankle area.  This is in the skin texture itself.

[color=#0000ff][size=4]MANY THANKS TO:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/35535930/?]Yourskyrim123[/url] (Preset, collaboration, and testing)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]sfeile[/url] (testing)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/14844589/?]ZwabberdieBo[/url] (Awesome screenshots, testing, and skin assistance)

[color=#0000ff][size=4]CREDITS/RESOURCES:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63680/?]Born Dragon Skin[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21458/?]The Dryad[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77333/?]Mystique RaceMenu Preset
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28926/?]Thalmor Viceroy Inquisitors Clothes[/url]

If I forgot anyone please kindly remind me.  Thank You.

[/font][color=#0000ff][size=4]PERMISSIONS:[/size][/color]

This follower is a combination of the work of others.  Please seek their permissions in addition to mine.

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/qhxbkhcef/mystiquebackground.jpg[/img]

[font=Verdana][color=#0000ff][size=4]PLEASE CHECK OUT MY OTHER FOLLOWERS:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/35629995/?tb=mods&pUp=1][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/vn7axqznr/mfeile1974_Link.png[/img][/url]

Nexus Hot File 8/17/2016!!!  Thank You Everyone!!

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/uc0f4hpfr/mystiquehotfile.jpg[/img]
[/size][/color][/font][/center]
author: mfeile1974 and Yourskyrim123
